content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #345

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 139

Submitted by Walter Suarez from Kaiser Permanente

Chapter:
Section: Before Limitations
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
It would be helpful to consider adding a short section before "Limitations" that describe any preconditions needed in order for CDS Hooks to operate. Preconditions regarding EHRs, CDS Services, Communication between them,

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #345

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Call (6-6-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-06-06_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

@isacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Guilherme

Disposition: Not Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Per CDS Wg call, the specification is reasonably short and intended to be readable. Preconditions including: EHR has FHIR server, CDS Service can receive messages over HTTP, etc are explicitly intended to be implied from the existing information in the specification itself.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
